attributes.action: U.K. calls for a Vote of No Confidence in the Government’s response to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Confidence needs to be restored to elected officials. The current Government is pursuing an agenda not voted upon by the people and the deception needs to end. No one asked for Build Back Better, where does that concept come from and why are so many countries using the same slogan? That is not a coincidence.
attributes.background: Challenge the Government data and testing regime they have used to enforce draconian removal of civic and personal freedoms from its people. End any form of restriction until the people can see exactly what data has been used to enforce lockdowns of any kind including Tiers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
